Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents a that is associated with the properties that are bound, or can be bound, on an activity.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
When users indicate that they want to edit property values, the **ActivityBind** dialog box opens to help in specifying the binding of properties on an activity.
